Interface Specifikacija

public interface Specifikacija
Interaface for GDrive and Local storage implementations

      whether it was successful

      private int initConfig()
      Private method
      Returns:
      whether it was successful

    • retrieveExt

      private String retrieveExt​(String ext)
      Private method
      Parameters:
      ext - filepath to get ext from
      Returns:
      extension from filepath

    • connectStorage

      int connectStorage​(String Path)
      Searches for a storage under the given directory. And begins login process if found. Otherwise prompt for storage creation.
      Parameters:
      Path - Absolute path to the root of the storage
      Returns:
      Returns 0 if successful, 1 if the login info is invalid, 2 if the storage is currently in use, 3 if it's not a storage and storage wasn't created.

    • disconnectStorage

      int disconnectStorage()
      Disconects the user from the storage.
      Returns:
      Returns 0 if successful, 404 if no storage is active and 1 if OS error occurs.

    • requestNewUser

      int requestNewUser()
      Begins the process of creating a new user.
      Returns:
      Returns 0 if successful, 404 if no storage is active, 403 if insufficient permission, 402 if invalid permission is given.

    • createFile

      int createFile​(String name, String destPath)
      Create a new empty file with the given name at the specified path.
      Parameters:
      name - New file name
      destPath - File based off the root of the storage
      Returns:
      Returns 0 if successful, 1 if insufficient permission, 7 if banned extension, 401 if OS error, 404 if no active storage

    • createFolder

      int createFolder​(String name, String destPath)
      Create a new empty folder with the given name at the specified path. Supports multiple parent creation.
      Parameters:
      name - New folder name
      destPath - Folder based off the root of the storage
      Returns:
      Returns 0 if successful, 1 if insufficient permission, 401 if OS error, 404 if no active storage

    • uploadFile

      int uploadFile​(String srcPath, String destPath)
      Upload file from srcPath to the destPath inside of the storage
      Parameters:
      srcPath - Absolute path to the source file
      destPath - Path based off the root of the storage
      Returns:
      Returns 0 if successful, 1 if insufficient permission, 2 if not a file, 3 if not a directory, 4 if file count is passed, 5 if total file size is maxed, 6 if max file size is passed, 401 if OS error, 404 if no active storage

    • uploadFiles

      int uploadFiles​(List<String> srcPaths, List<String> destPaths)
      Upload multiple files from srcPaths to the destPaths inside of the storage
      Parameters:
      srcPaths - Absolute path to the source files
      destPaths - Path based off the root of the storage
      Returns:
      Returns 0 if successful, 1 if insufficient permission, 2 if not a file, 3 if not a directory, 4 if file count is passed, 5 if total file size is maxed, 6 if max file size is passed, 401 if OS error, 404 if no active storage

    • deleteFile

      int deleteFile​(String path)
      Delete a file from the path if inside of storage
      Parameters:
      path - Path based off the roof of the storage
      Returns:
      Returns 0 if successful, 1 if insufficient permission, 2 if not a file, 3 if not existing, 401 if OS error, 404 if no active storage

    • deleteFolder

      int deleteFolder​(String path)
      Delete a folder and all the child files and folders inside
      Parameters:
      path - Path based off the roof of the storage
      Returns:
      Returns 0 if successful, 1 if insufficient permission, 2 if not a folder, 3 if not existing, 401 if OS error, 404 if no active storage

    • listFiles

      List<String> listFiles​(String path)
      List all files in the given directory, based off the storage root
      Parameters:
      path - Path based off the roof of the storage
      Returns:
      Returns list of strings type of List if successful and null otherwise

    • moveFile

      int moveFile​(String srcPath, String destPath)
      Move file from srcPath to destPath within the storage.
      Parameters:
      srcPath - Path to the file based off the roof of the storage
      destPath - Path to the destination based off the roof of the storage
      Returns:
      Returns 0 if successful, 1 if insufficient permission, 2 if source is not a file, 3 if destination is not a folder, 401 if OS error, 404 if no active storage

    • downloadFolder

      int downloadFolder​(String srcPath, String destPath)
      Download folder and all child files and folders from storage to the machine
      Parameters:
      srcPath - Path to the folder based off the roof of the storage
      destPath - Absolute path to the destination
      Returns:
      Returns 0 if successful, 1 if insufficient permission, 2 if source is not a folder, 3 if dest is not a folder, 401 if OS error, 404 if no active storage

    • downloadFile

      int downloadFile​(String srcPath, String destPath)
      Download file from storage to the machine
      Parameters:
      srcPath - Path to the folder based off the roof of the storage
      destPath - Absolute path to the destination
      Returns:
      Returns 0 if successful, 1 if insufficient permission, 2 if source is not a file, 3 if dest is not a folder, 401 if OS error, 404 if no active storage

    • addExtBan

      int addExtBan​(String ext)
      Add a ban for the extension.
      Parameters:
      ext - Extension to ban.
      Returns:
      Returns 0 if successful, 1 if extension is already banned, 404 if no active storage

    • removeExtBan

      int removeExtBan​(String ext)
      Remove a ban for the extension.
      Parameters:
      ext - Extension to unban.
      Returns:
      Returns 0 if successful, 1 if extension isn't banned, 404 if no active storage
